short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert GitHub repositories to plain text files easily. Transform code into a single formatted text file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our converter transforms GitHub repositories into formatted text files with only a few clicks. Perfect for developers working with AI tools or needing to analyze codebases for downstream LLM use.
Key Features:
• One-click repository structure visualization
• Smart file filtering by extension
• Token counting for AI model compatibility
• Dark/Light theme support
• Support for private repositories (with token)
• Download as text or zip file
• Clipboard integration

This extension runs entirely in your browser, ensuring your code and tokens remain private and secure. Whether you're preparing code for AI analysis, documentation, or code review, this tool streamlines the process of converting GitHub repositories into readable, structured text.

Note: Currently works better on small-medium repos, please use the website version for best performance on large projects, which is accessible either through clicking the extension's title or https://repo2txt.simplebasedomain.com

Also Note: Since GitHub has a rate limit on authenticated API calls, it is recommended to store your personal access token locally for best experience

Chrome Extension Github: https://github.com/blueif16/repo2txt
Original repo2txt Github: https://github.com/abinthomasonline/repo2txt
